title: Support Automation of Payout Summary downloads
body: I have not found an easy way to download payout summary in an automated fashion.  Probably not looked in the correct place yet.  Even went so far as to chat, and the rep indicate that this not currently supported.  This would be insane.  I have reported sales information from many other sources.  They would include SalesForce, FastSpring, and Zuora to name just a few.  Thanks.

comments.body: Please offer an API for customers to obtain sales data more readily.  It seems as if this is a feature offered by competitors.
Please offer an api on Windows dev.  We need to get store data into SQL/SASS databases.  Who has time in Business Analytics to create a screen scraper anymore?  What is this, 1997?
